definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: So that a new way to produce high-purity manganese carbonate is opened up.
sentences.chinese: 从而为高纯度碳酸锰的制备开辟了一条新的途径。

sentences.english: After centrifugation, the purity of the crude product was 23%.
sentences.chinese: 离心分离后，血红素粗品的纯度为23%。

sentences.english: Finally, the molecular distillation is performed to obtain medical-grade high-purity glycerin.
sentences.chinese: 最后进行分子蒸馏，得到药用级的高纯度的甘油。

sentences.english: The purity of medical oxygen is high without any contamination.
sentences.chinese: 医用氧气具有纯度高，无任何污染。

sentences.english: The purity of ursolic acid is high and the safety is good.
sentences.chinese: 提取分离方法实用可行，乌索酸纯度高，安全性好。

sentences.english: The purity of these cells was identified by immunohistochemical staining.
sentences.chinese: 用免疫细胞化学法进行细胞纯度鉴定。

sentences.english: The result indicated that the content of rhizoma polygonati polysaccharide is the highest by sonifier cell disrupter .
sentences.chinese: 结果表明超声波细胞粉碎仪提取的黄精多糖纯度最高。

sentences.english: Intake below-standard purity automatic emptying, adsorption tower.
sentences.chinese: 进气纯度不达标自动排空，吸附塔。

sentences.english: In 1970, high-grade heroin and opium flooded Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 1970年东南亚的高纯度海洛因和鸦片泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: Oridonin was purified by the further separation of column chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 柱色谱进一步分离可制备高纯度冬凌草甲素。

sentences.english: To assure the purity of Akhal-Teke horses entered into races.
sentences.chinese: 保证参加平地赛马的阿哈马出生来源的纯度。

sentences.english: High - purified products can be gained through rectification of dimmer.
sentences.chinese: 二聚产物经过精馏可获得高纯度产品。

sentences.english: The further improvement of labeling yield and purity of the label should be made.
sentences.chinese: 进一步的工作是要提高标记率和标记物的纯度。

sentences.english: The Mw of glycogen extracted by enzymatic method was higher and the purity…
sentences.chinese: 酶解糖原比碱提糖原的相对分子质量大而纯度较低。

sentences.english: Dracaena people who can resist high purity.
sentences.chinese: 龙血纯度高的人才能抵抗。

sentences.english: Highly purified salt is produced by the gore film decontamination technology.
sentences.chinese: 研究用戈尔膜分离净化盐水生产出高纯度工业盐。

definition: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution)/consistency/thickness/density/viscosity
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
to refine (a substance)/to purify/to refine (one's skills, writing etc)/refined/polished/succinct/skilled/capable
